title.#text: A method for age estimation in the swamp wallaby ()

author.details: Faculty of Veterinary and Agricultural Science, The University of Melbourne, Werribee, Vic. 3030, Australia.
School of BioSciences, The University of Melbourne, Parkville, Vic. 3010, Australia.

front.abstract: We investigated molar progression as an index of age in the swamp wallaby (Wallabia bicolor) by examining a small sample of known-age specimens. We demonstrate a strong relationship between age and molar index in W. bicolor [log10(age, in days)=(MI+4.6864)/2.2179, R2=0.93], which will facilitate more detailed investigation of this species.
